title: Tax levy, in general
context: PART I. GENERAL PROVISIONS Note Sections 239-1 to 239-13 designated as Part I by L 2002, c 209, §5. §239-1 Tax levy, in general. There shall be levied and assessed upon each public service company a tax in the manner provided by this chapter. [L 1932 2d, c 43, §1; am L 1933, c 183, §2; RL 1935, §2140; RL 1945, §5671; RL 1955, §126-1; am L Sp 1957, c 1, §9(a); am L 1963, c 147, §2(b); HRS §239-1] Case Notes Cited: 34 H. 324.
